channel.title: The lottery game [Made for experience and education purposes]
channel.description:
Hi guys and welcome to my lottery simulator game :) i am making this for learning and experience only, if you don't like it, then dont comment. Lets get to it:
[B][I]What is the lottery game?[/I][/B] The lottery game is a fun little game where you need to get money to bet on the lottery, To gain money you can get a job. There are a ton of jobs each paying at different rates per minute. You can also go to university and college to gain 'Education points' which help you get a better job. Better job = More money. The lottery isnt exactly 100%, you can win something by just getting the lucky ball, anyway. Please enjoy the media, i will start a new log from this point onwards, this game is pretty basic.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uIkkD2S.png[/img]
[B][I]Systems to implement [/I][/B]
[ul][*]College system [*]University System [*]Quit job [*]More jobs [*]random events like getting mugged hah :)[/ul]
constructive criticism is appreciated, Any feedback is appreciated.

item.description:
@Special_Air_Service wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

Looks like a cool project, you could add a criminal system? Like robbing banks or stuff? Not trying to turn this into GTA but it’d be a cool feature

haha, hey thats a pretty good idea…maybe even have a health system where you actually need buy food and water…FUCK IT MAKE A LIFE SIMULATOR

Read full topic
